body: First comment didnt read the other 2 volumes lol
would of been hot af if one of the Konome pics was implied to not been with the MC :×

Yearbook, huh. It was a bit rushed. Each student deserved 2-3 pics, but that would mean a lot work for the artist. So I understand.  Some naughty graduating student made a sex year-book. Funny idea. :P
